activities: Platform Specialty Products Corporation will be collecting organizational data, from certain of its European Subsidiaries.  The data will be collected from time-to-time for the purposes of, inter alia, headcount reporting, salary planning and performance appraisals.  Information will include, but not be limited to, salary, date of hire, job history and performance appraisals for the purpose of the achieving the objectives listed above.
